title: [Shinozuka Yuuji] - Married Woman Life
description:
A Perfect Marriage Becomes a Perfect Affair!

Every woman wishes for that happily ever after, but when time flies by and you've become a neglected housewife, what's a woman to do? Getting sly looks from a delinquent young buck makes them feel just like they did in their high school years, but unlike then, they know exactly what they want! With the skill of a matured woman and the killer body of an all-star milf, they'll turn the tables and teach these playboys a thing or two!

Wife Life by Shinozuka Yuuji proves the adage that a happy wife leads to a happy life, no matter who the partner is! Whether it's delinquent boy toys spending long nights with unhappy housewives, or divorcees finding new love in the arms of a new man, these cougars are on the prowl to give some motherly tender love and care. With ten seductive chapters including a special after story featuring Wife Life cover girl, Yuuji proves that women just get better with age!
author: Shinozuka Yuuji
